name: ChromaDex Corporation
description: ChromaDex Corporation is a global biosciences company dedicated to providing innovative solutions in the fields of nutrition, health, and wellness. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, ChromaDex specializes in the research, development, and commercialization of natural ingredients derived from plants. The company is particularly known for its flagship product, TRU NIAGEN®, a patented form of nicotinamide riboside (NR), which is a compound that has been shown to boost levels of NAD+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide) in the body, supporting cellular health and promoting healthy aging. ChromaDex’s commitment to scientific research is reflected in its collaborations with various universities and research institutions, ensuring that its products are backed by robust scientific evidence. The company also focuses on sustainability and environmental responsibility, sourcing ingredients in a manner that supports ecological balance. Through its innovative products and dedication to research, ChromaDex aims to empower individuals to live healthier lives and improve their overall well-being.
